english: There is nothing the lower orders like better than a little downright good-humoured rating .
chinese: 下层阶级最喜欢的就是带点爽直愉快的批评。

english: For the lower-class children, the centers will offer exemplary medical and dental care .
chinese: 对于下层阶级的孩子，中心将提供模范的医疗和牙科保健。

english: There must, he says, be a lower class, given up to physical toil and confined to an animal nature .
chinese: 他说，一定得有一个只有动物本能的下层阶级，专门从事体力劳动。

english: They all sought the same goals: impartial government, fair taxation, regulation of public service companies and expanded social services for the lower classes .
chinese: 他们追求的共同目标是：大公无私的政府、公平的税收、对公共事业公司的管理、以及面向下层阶级的公益服务事业的扩大。

english: Is thought be a car belonging to the lower class in the u . s .
chinese: 在美国会被看成是属于下层阶级的
下层阶级造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The creation of a new underclass in china and its implications
chinese: 中国新的下层阶级的产生和它的含意。

english: It dealt with topics such as problems facing society , oppression of the lower classes , etc
chinese: 它取材于诸如面对社会的问题、下层阶级的被压迫等等这样的主题。

english: There has always been a tendency in britain for high - born people to look down their noses at the lower classes
chinese: 英国一直有一种趋向：出身高贵的人们瞧不起下层阶级。

english: It passed gradually from the rich , to whom it was at first exclusively reserved , to the lower classes , and then its ravages could not be arrested
chinese: 吸鸦片的恶习从富有阶级鸦片首先是专给他们享用的一直蔓延到了下层阶级，这种灾祸就再也无法禁止了。

english: Connie thought , how extremely like all the rest of the classes the lower classes sounded . just the same thing over again , tevershall or mayfair or kensington
chinese: 康妮听着这一番话，心里想，下层阶级和其他一切阶级相象极了，随处都是一样：达娃斯哈或伦敦的贵族区梅费或根新洞都是一样。

english: In the late 1970 ’ s , nearly a third of all blacks still belonged to the underclass americans so that they are poor , underprivileged and unable to seize the opportunity of advancement
chinese: 20世纪70年代末期，几乎有三分之一的黑人属于下层阶级的美国人，穷困潦倒，没有地位，无法获得发展机会。

english: The next morning , at nine o clock , he entered franz s room , followed by a tailor , who had eight or ten roman peasant costumes on his arm ; they selected two exactly alike , and charged the tailor to sew on each of their hats about twenty yards of ribbon , and to procure them two of the long silk sashes of different colors with which the lower orders decorate themselves on f
chinese: 第二天早晨九点钟，店主走进弗兰兹的房间，后面跟着一个裁缝，裁缝的手臂上搭着八九套罗马农民的服装。他们挑选了两套一式一样合身的服装，然后叫裁缝在他们每人的帽子上缝上二十码左右的缎带，再给两绺下层阶级在节日时装饰用的各种颜色的长丝穗。
